title: Projects
description: A few programs I've made implementing different technologies. It shows just code for now. I work on current and new projects regularly.

list.title: Warehouse
list.description: Web API for organizing your warehouse items. It can be used as a backend service for e-commerce.
list.text: With user authentication, transactional database and asynchronous cache system. It can serve as a microservice in a Distributed System.

list.title: Chat Room
list.description: Single page application connecting clients in a chat room through Websockets
list.text: The purpose of this app is to demonstrate real time communication based in events. This technology is also used in push notifications, data sync, GPS trackers, and more.

list.title: Cat Identifier
list.description: Three-layer Neural Network trained to identify cats in pictures, using binary classification to determine whether there is a cat in the picture or not.
list.text: Binary classification is used in real life not only in images, but also to filter spam, detect fraud, or even to give medical diagnosis.

list.title: CLI Todo List
list.text: CLI means 'Command Line Interface', is a program handled by commands in a terminal, so it doesn't have a graphical interface. CLI programs are widely used in the world of software development.

list.title: Web Portfolio
list.description: The source code of the page you're in.
list.text: Static page with different components handled with React hooks, all text and images is dynamically added from JSON files. Responsiveness and design with Tailwind CSS.
